title: When I meet a stupid kid that blames the jungler because he can't play safe and dies.

replies.body: http://img.memecdn.com/mean-while-in-russia_o_2133575.jpg

I recognize that photograph, that wasn't russia. That was the inflatable tanks from WWII that fooled Hitler into thinking there was going to be a massive attack in another location.

Which is a hell of a lot more funny than "Meanwhile in Russia." Who the hell screwed up that meme.

> [{quoted}](name=Love Tentacle,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sATOK2UJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-09-18T16:01:15.743+0000)
>
> I recognize that photograph, that wasn't russia. That was the inflatable tanks from WWII that fooled Hitler into thinking there was going to be a massive attack in another location.
> 
> Which is a hell of a lot more funny than "Meanwhile in Russia." Who the hell screwed up that meme.

The "Ghost Battlion" made up of artists and special effect artists.

I have no idea who thought it up, but I have another one with russians lifting a tank. 

Tank memes are the best memes, that is what I learned.

https://i.imgflip.com/v1jdc.jpg
This photo would have been better if they edited out the air tube used to fill that thing. :P
http://memeshappen.com/media/created/Seriously-WHERE-is-our-tank-meme-1826.jpg
It is much better when they've already managed to die twice in a 1v1 before the jungler finishes their first clear, then start rage-pinging them.
As a fellow jungler main, I understand your pain.
dudeee seriously.. like play defense? they are pushing the lane and they want me to gank and tower dive? like no way... will i ever play as a noobie.
As a jungle main, I need this.
{{champion:157}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:122}} shove 24/7 and lane bully so obviously they get ganked, ''gg noob jungler i've been 2v1 the whole game kys'' **an ally has disconnected**
Dear lord, give me patience because if you give me strength im gonna kill a bitch. Does that fit?
I had a game yesterday like this. I was playing Jungle Shen and they had a Shaco jungle. Yet my lanes kept pushing up without vision. Their Shaco went 11/1 and, somehow, that was my fault.

*lanes pushed to ally tower mutiple times, ask jungler for help, gets dived 2v1.* 

Is it Ok for me to blame the jungler then?

> [{quoted}](name=Bagguette,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sATOK2UJ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-09-19T13:56:13.004+0000)
>
> *lanes pushed to ally tower mutiple times, ask jungler for help, gets dived 2v1.* 
> 
> Is it Ok for me to blame the jungler then?

Yes, yes it is.
I don't see the info regarding the rest of the map, thusly it's too early to properly judge. There is more than one lane every game a jungler needs to worry about.
WIn your own lane

> [{quoted}](name=SonicMaster02,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sATOK2UJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-18T15:34:46.367+0000)

thats from accel world right?

> [{quoted}](name=free software,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sATOK2UJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-18T22:28:16.992+0000)
>
> thats from accel world right?

Don't know
Yes.
The guy who blames jg when he's being dove at his own tower*

If someone is that behind a jungler can't help them anymore. Clearly that person is shit at laning anyway, obviously they either couldn't lane well enough to prevent the enemy from being so much stronger than them to dive, or they got themselves fucked by having 0 awareness and got themselves ganked or camped without properly working around it.

This doesn't apply to all situations.

I was ADC with an Ekko jungle trying to salvage any lane but ours (which was the only one that could be salvaged).
